section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:To the tribe of Aslam Allah has granted safety and to the tribe of Ghifar Allah has granted pardon. Verily it is not I that say this, but (it is) Allah the Exalted and Glorious. (who) says this
